channel.title: Error
channel.description:
[code] client.java:880: illegal start of expression public void AddDroppedItems() { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
How can i fix this? adding a } before it gives me around 70 more errors.
Thanks

Replace txt4 with plrText and replace string4UpdateRequired with plrTextUpdateRequired
